title: Ford Australia: 75 years
creator_credit: Richard Cornish and Q Media Productions
brief_description: Geelong, July 1st 1925 and Australia’s first model T Ford rolled off a temporary production line. In the year 2000 the Ford Motor Company celebrated 75 years of continuous production in Australia. This video explores the Model T, the world’s first ute designed and built in Geelong, Fordson Tractors, the Customline, Ford GTs and many more through to the current model Ford AUII.
